text: Vera Zelinskaya (26 August 1944 – 6 June 2021) was a Russian movie production designer. She was known for her works on Window to Paris, Time for Sorrow Hasn't Come Yet and Of Freaks and Men.Умерла художник-постановщик Вера Зелинская Zelinskaya was born in Novosibirsk, Russia. Zelinskaya died in Saint Petersburg, Russia on 6 June 2021, aged 74. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian designers Category:People from Saint Petersburg
title: Vera Zelinskaya
